sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān bùxíng qù shàngbān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais au travail à pied tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I walk to work every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 公司进行了大规模裁员。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī jìnxíng le dà guīmó cáiyuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise a procédé à des licenciements massifs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company carried out large-scale layoffs.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào jiéshěng yòng diàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons économiser l'électricité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should save electricity.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng quèrèn yīxià nǐ de dìngdān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez confirmer votre commande.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please confirm your order.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yīqǐ qù shǎng huā ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons admirer les fleurs ensemble.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go admire the flowers together.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jiǔdiàn de shèshī hěn wánshàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les installations de l'hôtel sont très complètes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The hotel facilities are very complete.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bǎ dōngxi fàng jìn hézi lǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mets les choses dans la boîte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Put the things in the box.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān wǒ qǐngkè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Aujourd'hui c'est moi qui invite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Today I'll treat you.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ de yīfu tài zāng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tes vêtements sont trop sales.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Your clothes are too dirty.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xǐyījī huài le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La machine à laver est cassée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The washing machine is broken.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Guònián yào fā hóngbāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: On donne des enveloppes rouges pendant le Nouvel An.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Red envelopes are given during Chinese New Year.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他是北京大学的研究生。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì Běijīng Dàxué de yánjiūshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est étudiant en master à l'Université de Pékin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a graduate student at Peking University.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ duì zhèngzhì bù tài gǎn xìngqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne m'intéresse pas beaucoup à la politique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm not very interested in politics.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个包裹的重量是多少？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège bāoguǒ de zhòngliàng shì duōshao?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quel est le poids de ce colis ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is the weight of this package?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yào huì qián gěi jiārén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux envoyer de l'argent à ma famille.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to transfer money to my family.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Āyí, nín hǎo!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bonjour, madame !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Hello, auntie!

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们要彻底解决这个问题。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào chèdǐ jiějué zhège wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons résoudre complètement ce problème.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must solve this problem thoroughly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ shuō de díquè yǒu dàolǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce que tu dis est effectivement raisonnable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What you said is indeed reasonable.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shāngdiàn zhèngzài zuò cùxiāo huódòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le magasin fait une promotion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The store is having a promotional sale.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ píngshí hěn shǎo kàn diànshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je regarde rarement la télévision d'habitude.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I seldom watch TV usually.
